column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////In spite of all the hype for Chicago deep dish
column2: I was thoroughly unimpressed. We had to wait half-an-hour for the pizza
column3: and the beer selection was very limited (any self-respectable pizza joint will have an awesome beer selection). It gets three stars
column4: since the seating for large groups is great
column5: the food was adequately filling and the company was good (albeit this is not something the joint can manipulate directly).
